title: I regret buying this MYSTERY TECH
description: Get a 4-week trial, free postage, and a digital scale at  Thanks to Stamps.com for sponsoring the show!  Thanks to @JakeSimmons for the most cursed Xbox / Sonic the Hedgehog controller I've ever seen...  Totally not a PS5 Fan on Amazon:  MKBHD x Atoms M251 Sneakers:  Amiga A500 Mini on Amazon:  NexDock Wireless:  Belkin MagSafe iPhone MacBook Mount on Amazon:  Hoglet Fidget Mouse on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe for more!
